org.jasig.cas.util

Class WebflowCipherExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.util.AbstractCipherExecutor<byte[],byte[]>
      • org.jasig.cas.util.BinaryCipherExecutor
        • org.jasig.cas.util.WebflowCipherExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CipherExecutor<byte[],byte[]>

    @Component(value="webflowCipherExecutor")
public class WebflowCipherExecutor
extends BinaryCipherExecutor
    This is WebflowCipherExecutor, that reads webflow keys from CAS configuration and presents a cipher.
    Since:
    4.2

      • WebflowCipherExecutor

        @Autowired
public WebflowCipherExecutor(@Value(value="${webflow.encryption.key:}")
                               java.lang.String secretKeyEncryption,
                               @Value(value="${webflow.signing.key:}")
                               java.lang.String secretKeySigning,
                               @Value(value="${webflow.secretkey.alg:AES}")
